snippet: As investigations into possible improprieties in flood-damage assessment continue, the Federal Emergency Management Agency will give homeowners until Oct. 15 to reopen their cases.
abstract: Federal Emergency Management Agency extends deadline for Hurricane Sandy victims to request reopening of flood insurance claims.
lead_paragraph: As investigations into possible improprieties in flood-damage assessment continue, the Federal Emergency Management Agency will give homeowners until Oct. 15 to reopen their cases.

headline.main: FEMA Extends Deadline to Refile Hurricane Sandy Insurance Claims
headline.print_headline: Hurricane Sandy Victims Get More Time on Claims
